document.full_text: the launch of nintendo co ltd's next-generation wii console failed to address investor concerns the firm is missing the gaming market's shift to social networking, sending its shares tumbling to a five-year low.
document.title: nintendo wii u underwhelms investors
lines_and_colors: the launch of nintendo co ltd's next-generation wii console failed to address investor concerns the firm is missing the gaming market's shift to social networking, sending its shares tumbling to a five-year low.
